name: Donut or Cookie
description:
Donut or Cookie is a side-view physics puzzle game.

The player needs to toss a pink donut or cookie into the customer's bag. you can choose a donut or a cookie, they have 2 shapes, a circle and a square, this is actively used in solving puzzles.

The game has 80 levels that become more difficult as you progress, new items are added to pass, complicating and diversifying the gameplay.

I bet only 25% of people will complete all levels and only 1% will collect all 3 candies in each level.
So if you are looking for challenging puzzles then welcome! welcome!
